name: Happytown
description:
Make the world happy!

Welcome to Lindin, you're very own city! Your job as mayor to make your citizens feel good while not going into debt. The neighboring cities of New Ork and Shengrei could use some help to. Maybe you should negotiate with them.

Happytown is a game jam game made for the Wowie Game Jam. The programming and UI design was done by Agira. KringlePringles crafted the beautiful pixel art for this game.

The theme was "Everything Interacts with Everything"

Please leave some feedback in the comments as it helps us improve as Game Developers. I (Agira) would like to thank Jonas Tyroller for hosting this jam. This was my very first jam. I would also like to thank you, the player, for playing this game.
